S04n471:1: atha khalu anyalokadhātvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmaṣṭau gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasmin samaye tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalādabhyutthitā abhūvan |
S04n471:2: te'ñjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavato'bhimukhā bhagavantaṃ namasyamānā bhagavantametadūcuḥ-saced bhagavānasmākamanujānīyāt,
S04n471:3: vayamapi bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau saṃprakāśeyama vācayema lekhayema pūjayema,
S04n471:8: santi kulaputrā iha mamaivāsyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi ekasya bodhisattvasya parivāraḥ |
S04n471:9: evaṃrūpāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ ṣaṣṭyeva gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi,
S04n471:10: yeṣāmekaikasya bodhisattvasya iyāneva parivāraḥ ye mama parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti saṃprakāśayiṣyanti ||
S04n471:12: atheyaṃ sahā lokadhātuḥ samantāt sphuṭitā visphuṭitā abhūt |
S04n471:13: tebhyaśca sphoṭāntarebhyo bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyuttiṣṭhante sma suvarṇavarṇaiḥ kāyairdvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ,
S04n471:15: imāmeva sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ niśritya te khalvimamevaṃrūpaṃ bhagavataḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā pṛthivyā adhaṃ samutthitāḥ,
S04n471:17: tādṛśānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ gaṇīnāṃ mahāgaṇīnāṃ gaṇācāryāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukopamāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
S04n471:18: ye itaḥ sahāyā lokadhātordharaṇīvivarebhyaḥ samunmajjante sma |
S04n471:35: kaḥ punarvādaḥ pañcāśadbodhisattvaparivārāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām? peyālam |
S04n471:39: na teṣāṃ saṃkhyā vā gaṇanā vā upamā vā upaniṣadvā upalabhyate,
S04n471:40: ya iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau dharaṇīvivarebhyo bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samunmajjante sma |
S04n471:41: te ca unmajjyonmajjya yena sa mahāratnastūpo vaihāyasamantarīkṣe sthitaḥ,
S04n471:42: yasmin sa bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ,
S04n471:43: bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sārdhaṃ siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S04n471:45: upasaṃkramya ca ubhayayostathāgatayorarhatoḥ samyaksaṃbuddhayoḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā sarvāṃśca tān bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyātmīyān nirmitāṃstathāgatavigrahān ye te samantato daśasu dikṣvanyonyāsu lokadhātuṣu saṃnipatitāḥ,
S04n471:47: tān sarvānabhivandya namaskṛtya ca anekaśatasahasrakṛtvastāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān pradakṣiṇīkṛtya nānāprakārairbodhisattvastavairabhiṣṭutya ekānte tasthuḥ |
S04n471:48: añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ ca prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhisaṃmukhaṃ namaskurvanti sma ||
S04n471:49: tena khalu punaḥ samayena teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pṛthivīvivarebhya unmajjatāṃ tathāgatāṃśca vandamānānāṃ nānāprakārairbodhisattvastavairabhiṣṭuvatāṃ paripūrṇāḥ pañcāśadantarakalpā gacchanti sma |
S04n471:50: tāṃśca pañcāśadantarakalpān sa bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastūṣṇīmabhūt |
S04n471:53: yathārūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtena tāścatasraḥ parṣadastamevaikaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ saṃjānante sma |
S04n471:54: imāṃ ca sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ śatasahasrākāśaparigṛhītāṃ bodhisattvaparipūrṇāmadrākṣuḥ |
S04n471:55: tasya khalu punarmahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeścatvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S04n471:61: ime catvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasya mahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeḥ pramukhā abhūvan |
S04n471:62: atha khalu catvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasya mahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeragrataḥ sthitvā bhagavato'bhimukhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadūcuḥ-kaccid bhagavato'lpābādhatā mandaglānatā sukhasaṃsparśavihāratā ca?
S04n471:63: kaccid bhagavan sattvāḥ svākārāḥ suvijñāpakāḥ suvineyāḥ suviśodhakāḥ?
S04n471:65: atha khalu te catvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhagavantāmābhyāṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣanta-
S04n471:69: mā haiva khedaṃ janayanti lokanāthasya bhāṣataḥ ||2 ||
S04n471:70: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasya mahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeḥ pramukhāṃścaturo bodhisattvān mahāsattvānetadavocat-evametat kulaputrāḥ, evametat |
S04n471:72: svākārāśca mamaiva te sattvāḥ suvijñāpakāḥ suvineyāḥ suviśodhakāḥ |
S04n471:73: na ca me khedaṃ janayanti viśodhyamānāḥ |
S04n471:75: mamaiva hyete kulaputrāḥ sattvāḥ paurvakeṣu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kṛtaparikarmāṇaḥ |
S04n471:78: yatra ye'pi śrāvakabhūmau vā pratekabuddhabhūmau vā kṛtaparicaryā abhuvan,
S04n471:79: te'pi mayaiva etarhi buddhadharmajñānamavatāritāḥ saṃśrāvitāśca paramārtham ||
S04n471:80: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣanta—
S04n471:82: svākārā yena te sattvāḥ suvineyāḥ suśodhakāḥ ||3 ||
S04n471:83: ye cedaṃ jñāna gambhīraṃ śṛṇvanti tava nāyaka |
S04n471:84: śrutvā ca adhimucyante uttaranti ca nāyaka ||4 ||
S04n471:85: evamukte bhagavāṃstasya mahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeḥ pramukhebhyaścaturbhyo bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu kulaputrāḥ,
S04n471:87: tena khalu punaḥ samayena maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyeṣāṃ cāṣṭānāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmetadabhavat-adṛṣṭapūrvo'yamasmābhirmahābodhisattvagaṇo mahābodhisattvarāśiḥ |
S04n471:88: aśrutapūrvaśca yo'yaṃ pṛthivīvivarebhyaḥ samunmajya bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā bhagavantaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti bhagavantaṃ ca pratisaṃmodante |
S04n471:89: kutaḥ khalvime bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgatā iti?
S04n471:90: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmanā vicikitsāṃ kathaṃkathāṃ viditvā teṣāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkamājñāya tasyāṃ velāyāmañjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhigītenaitamevārthaṃ paripṛcchanti sma—
S04n471:93: kuto ime kathaṃ vāpi āgacchanti maharddhikāḥ |
S04n471:106: ato bahutarāścānye yeṣāṃ daśa ca pañca ca ||12 ||
S04n471:109: catvāri trīṇi dve cāpi gaṅgāvālikayā samāḥ |
S04n471:118: koṭī koṭī ca koṭī ca ardhakoṭī tathaiva ca ||18 ||
S04n471:123: viṃśatiddaśa pañcātha catvāri trīṇi dve tathā |
S04n471:125: carantyekātmakā ye ca śāntiṃ vindanti caikakāḥ |
S04n471:126: gaṇanā teṣa naivāsti ye ihādya samāgatāḥ ||22 ||
S04n471:128: śalākāṃ gṛhya hastena paryantaṃ naiva so labhet ||23 ||
S04n471:131: kenaiṣāṃ deśito dharmaḥ kena bodhīya sthāpitāḥ |
S04n471:133: bhittvā hi pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ samantena caturdiśam |
S04n471:142: ime'dya sahasā dṛṣṭā ākhyāhi caritaṃ mune ||30 ||
S04n471:146: kuta enti ime śūrā bodhisattvā viśāradaḥ ||32 ||
S04n471:147: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ye te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyebhyo lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrebhyo'bhyāgatā bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya nirmitāḥ,
S04n471:148: ye'nyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma,
S04n471:149: ye bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya samantādaṣṭabhyo digbhyo ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu mahāratnasiṃhāsaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ paryaṅkabaddhāḥ,
S04n471:150: teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ ye svakasvakā upasthāyakāḥ,
S04n471:151: te'pi taṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ bodhisattvarāśiṃ dṛṣṭvā samantāt pṛthivīvivarebhya unmajjantamākāśadhātupratiṣṭhitam,
S04n471:152: te'pyāścaryaprāptāstān svān svāṃstathāgatānetadūcuḥ-kuto bhagavan iyanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgacchantyaprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ?
S04n471:153: evamuktāste tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstān svān svānupasthāyakānetadūcuḥ-āgamayadhvaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā muhūrtam |
S04n471:154: eṣa maitreyo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ śākyamuneranantaraṃ vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04n471:155: sa etaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametamarthaṃ paripṛcchati |
S04n471:156: eṣa ca bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vyākariṣyati |
S04n471:158: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma-sādhu sādhu ajita |
S04n471:160: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma-tena hi kulaputrāḥ sarva eva prayatā bhavadhvam |
S04n471:165: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n471:177: jñānaṃ ca me yasya na kāci saṃkhyā ||35 ||
S04n471:181: śṛṇotha me yādṛśakā yathā ca te ||36 ||
S04n471:182: atha khalu bhagavānimā gāthā bhāṣitvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ maitrayaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma-ārocayāmi te ajita,
S04n471:184: ya ime ajita bodhisattvā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā acintyā atulyā agaṇanīyāḥ,
S04n471:187: mayaite ajita sarve bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ saṃpraharṣitāḥ,
S04n471:189: mayā caite kulaputrā asmin bodhisattvadharme paripācitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā niveśitāḥ parisaṃsthāpitā avatāritāḥ paribodhitāḥ pariśodhitāḥ |
S04n471:190: ete ca ajita bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau adhastādākāśadhātuparigrahe prativasanti |
S04n471:191: svādhyāyoddeśacintāyoniśomanasikārapravṛttā ete kulaputrā asaṃgaṇikārāmā asaṃsargābhiratā anikṣiptadhurā ārabdhavīryāḥ |
S04n471:195: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n471:224: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca saṃbahulāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyāścaryaprāptānyabhūvan,
S04n471:225: adbhutaprāptāni vismayaprāptāni-kathaṃ nāma bhagavatā anena kṣaṇavihāreṇa alpena kālāntareṇa amī etāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ samādāpitāḥ,
S04n471:227: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-kathamidānīṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena kumārabhūtena kapilavastunaḥ śākyanagarānniṣkasya gayānagarānnātidūre bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā?
S04n471:229: tatkathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena iyatā kālāntareṇedamaparimitaṃ tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kṛtam,
S04n471:231: yo'yaṃ bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśiriyatā bhagavan kālāntareṇa anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitaḥ paripācitaśca?
S04n471:232: asya bhagavan bodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvarāśergaṇyamānasya kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapyanto nopalabhyate |
S04n471:235: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣo navo daharaḥ śiśuḥ kṛṣṇakeśaḥ prathamena vayasā samanvāgataḥ pañcaviṃśativarṣo jātyā bhavet |
S04n471:237: evaṃ ca vadet-ete kulaputrā mama putrā iti |
S04n471:238: te ca varṣaśatikāḥ puruṣā evaṃ ca vadeyuḥ-eṣo'smākaṃ pitā janaka iti |
S04n471:239: tasya ca puruṣasya bhagavaṃstadvacanamaśraddheyaṃ bhavellokasya duḥśraddheyam |
S04n471:246: tāṃśca bhagavānevaṃ vadati-mayaite ādita eva samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ paripācitāḥ,
S04n471:248: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena mayaiṣa sarvavīryaparākramaḥ kṛta iti |
S04n471:249: kiṃcāpi vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatasya vacanaṃ śraddhayāgamiṣyāmaḥ-ananyathāvādī tathāgata iti |
S04n471:251: navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ khalu punarbhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vicikitsāmāpadyante |
S04n471:252: atra sthāne parinirvṛte tathāgate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pattīyiṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti nādhimokṣyanti |
S04n471:253: tataste bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n471:256: anāgate'dhvani bodhisattvayānīyāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā śrutvā na vicikitsāmāpadyeranniti ||
S04n471:257: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
S04n471:262: ime ca te ārya viśāradā bahū
S04n471:267: bhittvā mahīṃ ye iha adya āgatāḥ |
S04n471:279: eṣo ca no dehakaro ti brūyuḥ |
